svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
January 6, 2024" date: "2024-01-05"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
* Latest all core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by lightclient .Â Notes
from lightclient & Christine Kim : Testnet upgrade dates confirmed (assumes no
issues): Goerli Jan 17, Sepolia Jan 30 & HoleÅ¡ky Feb 7 Pectra (Prague + Electra) :
discussed small feature upgrade first vs focusing on Verkle (~18 months) and reviewed
proposed EIPs Precompile address ranges : proposed EIP7587 (reserves 0x100-0x1ff for
RIPs)
* Testnet upgrade dates confirmed (assumes no issues): Goerli Jan 17, Sepolia Jan 30 &
HoleÅ¡ky Feb 7
Testnet upgrade dates confirmed (assumes no issues): Goerli Jan 17, Sepolia Jan 30 &
* Pectra (Prague + Electra) : discussed small feature upgrade first vs focusing on
Verkle (~18 months) and reviewed proposed EIPs
Pectra (Prague + Electra) : discussed small feature upgrade first vs focusing on
* Precompile address ranges : proposed EIP7587 (reserves 0x100-0x1ff for RIPs)
Precompile address ranges : proposed EIP7587 (reserves 0x100-0x1ff for RIPs)
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.71% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.71% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~84%
supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split, estimated to cost billions of
dollars Consensus layer: Prysm 41%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of
finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split,
estimated to cost billions of dollars
Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split,
* Consensus layer: Prysm 41%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 41%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America &
Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America &
Layer 1
* libp2p TCP vs QUIC : TCP ~2x speed of QUIC
Client releases
* Consensus layer: Nimbus v24.1.0 : Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade and adds v3
blocks/{slot} Beacon API end-point
Consensus layer:
* Nimbus v24.1.0 : Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade and adds v3 blocks/{slot} Beacon API
end-point
* Execution layer: Erigon v2.56.0 : Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade Nethermind
v1.25.0-rc : Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade and OP Stack Canyon support
Execution layer:
* Erigon v2.56.0 : Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade
Erigon v2.56.0 : Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade
* Nethermind v1.25.0-rc : Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade and OP Stack Canyon support
Nethermind v1.25.0-rc : Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade and OP Stack Canyon support
Research
* Proposer selection with EIP7251 (increase max effective balance): probability
remains the same for consolidated validators
MEV
* Terence: timing games with blobs (post Dencun upgrade), may be more unpredictable
Terence: timing games with blobs (post Dencun upgrade), may be more unpredictable
* Timing.pics (dashboard of timing games): missed slots & bids selected by entity
Timing.pics (dashboard of timing games): missed slots & bids selected by entity
Layer 2
* Arbitrum Orbit supports using an ERC20 token for gas
Arbitrum Orbit supports using an ERC20 token for gas
* L2s TVL flips other L1s
L2s TVL flips other L1s
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs Informational EIP7587 : Reserve precompile address range for RIPs
EIPs
* Informational EIP7587 : Reserve precompile address range for RIPs
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7586 : Interest rate swaps ERC7588 : Blob transactions
metadata JSON schema
ERCs (application layer):
* ERC7586 : Interest rate swaps
ERC7586 : Interest rate swaps
* ERC7588 : Blob transactions metadata JSON schema
ERC7588 : Blob transactions metadata JSON schema
Stuff for developers
* Reminder: Solidity developer survey 2023 closes January 7
Reminder: Solidity developer survey 2023 closes January 7
* Foundry multibuild : GitHub Action to test building project with range of Solidity
versions
Foundry multibuild : GitHub Action to test building project with range of Solidity
* Overview of proxy contracts
Overview of proxy contracts
* Wagmi v2 : TanStack Query support, connect multiple connectors, switch chains while
disconnected and EIP6963 (multi injected provider discovery) support
Wagmi v2 : TanStack Query support, connect multiple connectors, switch chains while
* Viem v2 : low-level OP Stack actions & utilities and enhanced types
Viem v2 : low-level OP Stack actions & utilities and enhanced types
* Secureum RACE #25: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
Secureum RACE #25: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
Security
* Gamma (liquidity management) $4.5M exploit on Arbitrum via price manipulation
Gamma (liquidity management) $4.5M exploit on Arbitrum via price manipulation
* Radiant (Aave v2 fork) $4.5M exploit of new USDC market on Arbitrum via known
rounding issue
Radiant (Aave v2 fork) $4.5M exploit of new USDC market on Arbitrum via known rounding
issue
Ecosystem
* Vitalikâ€™s updated roadmap diagram single slot finality (SSF) to resolve PoS design
weaknesses, significant progress on rollups & Verkle trees, scourge redesigned, state
expiry a low priority and VDFs dead for now
Vitalikâ€™s updated roadmap diagram
* single slot finality (SSF) to resolve PoS design weaknesses, significant progress on
rollups & Verkle trees, scourge redesigned, state expiry a low priority and VDFs dead
for now
* Devcon Southeast Asia in Bangkok, November 12-15
Devcon Southeast Asia in Bangkok, November 12-15
Onchain stats
* Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 7.9 to 329.4 gwei, with 19.8 gwei average Zero net
issuance currently at 22.0 gwei 1.7k ETH net issuance this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 7.9 to 329.4 gwei, with 19.8 gwei average
* Zero net issuance currently at 22.0 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 22.0 gwei
* 1.7k ETH net issuance this week
1.7k ETH net issuance this week
* ETHUSD : $2,187 - $2,434, currently $2,246
ETHUSD : $2,187 - $2,434, currently $2,246
* ETHBTC : currently 0.051 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.051 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
* Vitalik calls for L2 CCIP resolvers for low cost ENS subdomains
Vitalik calls for L2 CCIP resolvers for low cost ENS subdomains
* Daimo bundle compression reduces cost of ERC4337 transactions on L2
Daimo bundle compression reduces cost of ERC4337 transactions on L2
* State of private voting
State of private voting
* Regen Learnings : research group for public goods funding
Regen Learnings : research group for public goods funding
Job Listings
* Status is hiring: Technical Chief Operating Officer - Apply here
Status is hiring: Technical Chief Operating Officer - Apply here
* ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
* US tax code: receipt of $10k+ in crypto (for trade/business) to be reported to IRS
within 15 days
US tax code: receipt of $10k+ in crypto (for trade/business) to be reported to IRS
* SBF second trial dropped by DoJ , including charges for unlawful campaign
contributions
SBF second trial dropped by DoJ , including charges for unlawful campaign
* Logan Paulâ€™s CryptoZoo buy back after game not delivered, in exchange for waiving
claims
Logan Paulâ€™s CryptoZoo buy back after game not delivered, in exchange for waiving
* UK users of centralized exchanges required to complete investor declaration
UK users of centralized exchanges required to complete investor declaration
General
* Orbit bridge $81M hack
Orbit bridge $81M hack
* Orange Spain internet outage , RIPE account hacked to misconfigure BGP routing &
RPKI config
Orange Spain internet outage , RIPE account hacked to misconfigure BGP routing & RPKI
config
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the weekâ€™s news in real time.
Permalink for this weekâ€™s issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-january-6-2024
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Jan 15 â€“ EFâ€™s Next Billion fellowship cohort 4 deadline

* Jan 17 â€“ Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade epoch 231680

* Jan 30 â€“ Sepolia testnet Dencun upgrade epoch 132608 (assuming no issues)
Jan 30 â€“ Sepolia testnet Dencun upgrade epoch 132608 (assuming no issues)
* Feb 2-4 â€“ ETH Cinco de Mayo hackathon (Cholula, Puebla)
